short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Track trending and viral content on Reddit

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Discover trending content on Reddit before it goes viral! RedditScout analyzes Reddit posts in real-time, helping you identify high-potential content using advanced engagement metrics.

Key Features:
• Visual indicators showing viral potential of posts
• Real-time scoring system based on upvotes, comments, and engagement velocity
• Trending post tracking and notifications
• Detailed analytics for each post including viral score and engagement metrics
• Clean, unobtrusive interface that integrates seamlessly with Reddit

Perfect for:
• Content creators looking for trending topics
• Marketers tracking viral content
• Researchers studying social media trends
• Redditors who want to engage with rising posts
• Community managers monitoring subreddit activity

RedditScout helps you stay ahead of Reddit trends by identifying high-engagement posts early, giving you valuable insights into what content is gaining traction across the platform.
